DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : multi-center, double-blind, placebo-controlled, randomized, parallel group, fixed dose design Phase : Phase III
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Udenafil to Treat Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Male patients aged 20 years or more diagnosed with ED Had uncontrolled blood pressure Had hepatic or renal dysfunction Was currently under anticancer chemotherapy Had a treatments for ED using other PDE5 inhibitors
